{{also|小說|小说}}
==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|しょう|せつ|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From {{compound|ja|小|説|tr1=shō|tr2=setsu|t1=small|t2=narrative, story}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|count=篇|しょうせつ|kyu=小說}}

# [[novel]], [[story]], [[fiction]]
